folder: Todt Hill Road & Ocean Terrace, Staten Island, NY
text:
Todt Hill Road, east side, slightly south of Ocean Terrace, showing the house and pond on the David J. Tysen Estate.

About 1910

By Mulford Simonson
From P. L. Sperr Collection
title: Richmond: Todt Hill Road - Ocean Terrace

folder: Todt Hill Road & Ocean Terrace, Staten Island, NY
text:
Mersereau Valley (Staten Island): A panoramic view of the valley looking northeastward from Todt Hill Road and Ocean Terrace. The Valley is the hollow fronting Todt Hill. View 3 is in a southeasterly direction and shows part of Dongan Hill.

1924
Views 1,2,3

P. L. Sperr

title: Richmond: Todt Hill Road - Ocean Terrace

folder: Todt Hill Road & Ocean Terrace, Staten Island, NY
text:
Todt Hill Road, south from near Ocean Terrace, showing the area in its winter setting (view 2).
View 1 is at Merrick Avenue, not far from Ocean Terrace, and shows the highest point on the Atlantic coast from Maine to Florida, the elevation being 409.8 feet.

View 1: August 9, 1926
View 2: February 22, 1927

P. L. Sperr

folder: Ocean Terrace & Todt Hill Road, Staten Island, NY
text:
Ocean Terrace, near Todt Hill Road, showing three winter scenes. This is a set of three views taken in the same area, the same day.

February 22, 1927
